content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'wwi-02_asadatalakedp203xb_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [wwi-02_asadatalakedp203xb_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://asadatalakedp203xb.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE topproducts (
	[visitorId] int,
	[productId] int,
	[itemsPurchasedLast12Months] int,
	[preferredProductId] int,
	[userId] int,
	[isTopProduct] bit,
	[isPreferredProduct] bit
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'top-products/part-00000-54c9150d-9abe-4688-8dd2-0a5ec2a93eb2-c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [wwi-02_asadatalakedp203xb_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM topproducts
GO
